result.execSummary:
The defendant Michael J Savage was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • 3rd Degree Sexual Assault, a class G felony, Wisconsin Statutes 940.225(3).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

superMiscConds.notes: To pay the costs of the action.   If probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and/or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt. To pay supervision fees as ordered by the Dept. of Corrections.

Maintain absolute sobriety from alcohol.  Not to possess or consume any controlled substances without a valid prescription and then only take in the amount and frequency prescribed.  Not to possess or use any drug paraphernalia.  No contact direct or indirect with victim, T.L.

Complete any counseling, evaluations, programs and assessments, including AODA assessment, as appropriate resulting from the Department's COMPAS assessment. If defendant does not receive sex offender counseling during his period of initial confinement, defendant is to immediately be evaluated at the start of his extended supervision period and begin treatment, if necessary.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

records.addlTxt: Defendant Michael J Savage in court with attorney Brett E Reetz.  Defendant Michael J Savage in custody.  Joan M. Korb appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Minute sheet. State amends charge to Class F Felony 3rd Degree Sexual Assault, gives plea agreement.  Court questions defendant on change of plea.  Rights/elements/max. penalties reviewed with defendant.  Defendant enters no contest plea to amended charge.  Defense stipulates to factual basis to accept plea.  Court finds plea made freely, knowingly and voluntarily, accepts plea, and finds guilty of amended charge of 3rd Degree Sexual Assault.   Court reviews collateral consequences of felony conviction, possible penalties. Defendant must have a DNA sample on file with the State of Wisconsin and pay a DNA surcharge. State/Defense ready to proceed to sentencing without the benefit of a PSI. State/Defense make joint sentencing recommendation. Court makes statement, imposes sentence. Bond is no longer in effect.
Change of attorney

ADDRESS INFO for Michael J Savage
Current: 1203 S. Duluth Avenue, c/o Door County Jail, Sturgeon Bay, WI 54235 United States  (Effective: 09-11-2015)
Prior: 252 Thorne Street, Apt. 2, Sturgeon Bay, WI 54235 United States
Defendant's sister called. He does NOT live at 252 Thorn St, Apt. 2 and she does NOT want his mail delivered there.
State's Discovery Demand
Defense waives reading of Information and enters not guilty plea. Bond remains as is.

Defendant Michael J Savage in court with attorney Brett E Reetz.  Defendant Michael J Savage in custody.  Joan M. Korb appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Court reviews events in file. Defense waives reading of the complaint.   Defense waives right to Prelim. Court questions defendant on waiver. Court finds waiver made freely and voluntarily, accepts waiver and binds over for trial. Court finds probable cause for bindover.  Status conference scheduled for November 6, 2015 at 09:00 am.
Defendant was fingerprinted by jail staff. (fingerprint card destroyed 11/10/15)

No contact direct or indirect with T.L., her residence, any family members residence or any residence she may be at. No contact with T.L's employers.   To be fingerprinted and photographed before leaving the Justice Center.

Defendant Michael J Savage in court with attorney Gregory A. Gerbers.  Defendant Michael J Savage in custody.  Joan M. Korb appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Atty Gerbers indicates he has a conflict with representing defendant, will have counsel appointed to represent defendant in all files.   Copy of Complaint given to Defendant in Court.  Court reviews charge(s), max. penalties, right to counsel, right to preliminary hearing. Court adjourns matter to allow PD office to appoint new counsel. Bond set.  Adjourned initial appearance scheduled for September 10, 2015 at 10:00 am.
